name: Crazy Extinguisher!
description:
Created for the June/July Jackpot Jam

Theme: Heatwave

You play as a fire extinguisher that has to get rid of the incoming "heatwave" click to spray your foam to get rid of the fire before the entire kitchen goes up in flames!

As you can see this game is pretty dang bad but oh well, I tried... Anyway, I don't think I will win but thanks for checking it out.
